data.title: Jon Hall
data.text:
AKA Charles Hall Locher

Born: 23-Feb-1915

Birthplace: Fresno, CA

Died: 13-Dec-1979

Location of death: North Hollywood, CA

Cause of death: Suicide

Remains: Buried, Forest Lawn Memorial Park Cemetery, Hollywood Hills, CA

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: The Hurricane

Father: Felix Locher (actor, b. 16-Jul-1882, d. 13-Mar-1969)

Wife: Frances Langford (singer, m. 4-Jun-1934, div. 1955)

Wife: Raquel Torres (m. 1959, div.)

Hollywood Walk of Fame 1724 Vine St. (motion pictures)

Hollywood Walk of Fame 6933 Hollywood Blvd. (television)

FILMOGRAPHY AS DIRECTOR

The Beach Girls and the Monster (1965)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

The Beach Girls and the Monster (1965)
